laboratory_examinations.findings: Low lung volumes, mild bilateral pleural effusion, but no evidence of focal parenchymal opacities suggesting pneumonia. The size of the cardiac silhouette is at the upper range of normal; however, no signs of overhydration are present. Unchanged course of the right-sided PICC line.
